lead_paragraph: People expressed dismay at a gathering that included several ex-military rulers, and leaders that some partly blamed for corruption, misrule and instability.
snippet: People expressed dismay at a gathering that included several ex-military rulers, and leaders that some partly blamed for corruption, misrule and instability....

headline.main: Hymn of Peace by Nigerian Leaders Strikes Some as Off Key
headline.print_headline: Peace Hymn in Nigeria Is Panned as Tone-Deaf
